# monetdbe
MonetDBe - the Python embedded MonetDB

https://github.com/monetdBSolutions/MonetDBe-Python/

# install

```
 CFLAGS="-I<monetdb_prefix>/include/monetdb -I<monetdb_prefix>/lib/monetdb" pip install .
```
